meanings.sent1: The green leaves are photosynthetic, meaning they can make food from sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Plants use photosynthetic processes to convert sunlight into energy.
meanings.sent3: The photosynthetic plants had a party under the sun, celebrating their ability to create food.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a photosynthetic factory, constantly producing new ideas and insights.
meanings.sent5: The photosynthetic nature of the leaves was evident in their vibrant green color and healthy appearance.

meanings.definition: Capable of or relating to photosynthesis.
meanings.sent1: The photosynthetic organisms in the ocean play a crucial role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: Certain bacteria are photosynthetic and can thrive in extreme environments.
meanings.sent3: The photosynthetic bacteria threw a photosynthesis-themed party, complete with sunlight cocktails.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was photosynthetic, drawing inspiration from the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The photosynthetic abilities of the algae allowed them to thrive in the sunlit waters.
